about_the_game:
Roadside Egg Stand is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Build and manage your own adorable roadside stands, offering fresh eggs and spreading joy across scenic small-town roads.

Imagine pulling over on a quiet country road to find a little wooden stand filled with colorful eggs, homemade treats, and a handwritten sign saying, “Fresh Eggs!” That warm, wholesome feeling is the heart of this game.

Raise Happy Chickens:

Nurture your flock, discover rare breeds, and collect eggs from speckled to golden!

Customize Your Stand:

Add flower baskets, lanterns, flowers … and hand-painted signs to make your stands extra charming.

Explore New Locations:

Expand to scenic spots like countryside lanes, forest trails, and lively village markets.

Fresh Eggs, Fresh Profits:

Serve your customers, set fair prices, and handle special requests to earn money, ensuring your chickens stay well-fed and happy!

Employee of the week: 

Celebrate your best chickens with fun titles and perks they’re part of the family!

Chill Vibes, Endless Fun:

No rush, no stress, just the cozy joy of growing your egg empire.

Maximize Idle: Automatic Egg Collection Anytime

With this idle feature, your chickens will keep laying eggs even when you're not online, without any manual care needed.

As your business grows, expand to new scenic spots, decorate your stands with cute, rustic touches, and serve happy villagers. 

Create your very own collection of unique chicken breeds, take ownership of every egg stand around the village, and decorate them in your signature style!

Imagine pulling over on a quiet country road to find a little wooden stand filled with colorful eggs, homemade treats, and a handwritten sign saying, “Fresh Eggs!” That warm, wholesome feeling is the heart of this game.

name: Roadside Egg Stand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

short_description: Bring the residents of Reine the freshest, finest eggs! Raise cute chickens, collect their eggs, and sell them at roadside egg stands scattered throughout the village. Decorate your egg stand, collect your daily earnings, restock with fresh eggs, and read the heartfelt letters from the villagers.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
